snippet.title: Survival Nation: Lost Horizon - Official Trailer | The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Get ready to fight off zombies. Check out gameplay in this trailer for Survival Nation: Lost Horizon, an upcoming open-world top-down zombie survival game. In Survival Nation: Lost Horizon, keep yourself and other survivors alive in a world gone to the zombies, upgrade your gear and skills, and keep civilization going in a world where humans are the top pick on the menu. Survival Nation: Lost Horizon is coming to PC.
